2.「待たせたのう <pc>よ。| わしじゃよ。: Sorry to keep you waiting, <pc>. It's|me.

5.「気がついたか？ お前さんは大ケガをして| このグランゼドーラ城に 運び込まれた: Did you notice?　You were brought here to Gran|Zedora Castle with serious injuries.

6.「グランゼドーラ城！| そうだ 私は アジトを抜け出して| 外に 助けを……助け: Gran Zedora Castle! Yes, I'm out of the hiding|place, outside, getting help...help...ugh.

7.「落ちついて 教えておくれ。| アジトを抜け出した……と言ったが| お前さんは: Calm down and tell me. You say you've escaped|from the safe house, but who the hell are you?

8.「私はユーリ……。魔法学の研究者です。| かつてはグランゼドーラ城で 妻と一緒に:
My name is Yuri... and I am a researcher in|the field of Magick. I used to work with my|wife at Gran Zedora Castle, researching|
|potions to strengthen living creatures.

9.「しかし……ある日 紅衣の悪夢団という| 悪しき組織に その研究成果を狙われ|:
But one day... an evil organization called the|Redcoat Nightmare Gang targeted his research|and kidnapped him, along with his wife and|
|children...

10.「そして 私たちは……紅衣の悪夢団の首領から| 肉体を強化する薬を作るよう 強要:
And we were forced by the leader of the|Redcoat Nightmare Clan to create a Strength|Medicine, and as a result, we participated in|
|many evil deeds.

11.「紅衣の悪夢団は ダークドレアムという存在を| 降臨させようと企み その供物を捧: The Redcoats are a group of fanatics who will|stop at nothing to bring down a being called|Nokturnus and offer him up as an offering.

12.「ダークドレアムが降臨してしまったら……| 世界は 崩壊すると言われています。|: It is said that if Nokturnus descends the|world will fall. I felt I had to tell someone|about this crisis...

13.「そこで私は 妻と相談し ひとりでアジトを| 脱出しました。しかし 追っ手を振り:
So I consulted with my wife and escaped the|hideout alone. However, I was injured when I|swatted away my pursuers... I'm so pathetic...|
|Ugh...

14.「もしかして あなた方は 悪夢団について| くわしい事情を 知っているのでは……: Perhaps you know something about the Nightmare|Gang? I have a favor to ask. Please...

15.<pc>は ユーリから|幻炎の灰（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>: <pc> received the Flame Ashes (Key|Items) from Yuri!<me 60>

16.「その幻炎の灰は 人目から隠された| 紅衣の悪夢団アジトへの道を開くために……|:
The Flame Ashes are a secret key that only the|members of the Red Riding Nightmare Troupe|possess in order to open the way to their|
|hideout, which is hidden from the public eye.

18.「おい しっかりせんか。| 気を確かに持つのじゃ！: Hey, pull yourself together. Stay with me!

19.「私を逃がすため 妻は まだアジトに……。| 悪夢団に協力してきた私が こんなこ:
My wife is still at the safe house to help me|escape, and I know it's selfish of me to ask|you to do this, after all I've done for the|
|Nightmare Gang, but...

21.「……どうやら 眠ってしまったようじゃ。| <pc>に 幻炎の灰を託せて| ホッ: ...It seems he has fallen asleep. He must be|relieved to entrust the Flame Ashes to|<pc>.

22.「しかし その幻炎の灰を どう使えば| アジトへ行けるか 聞きそびれてしまったの: However, I failed to ask him how to use the|Flame Ashes to get to the hideout. However, I|don't have time to wait for Yuri's recovery.

23.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。| あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐりて|: O crystal ball, answer my question. Tap into|the many threads of destiny, and show me the|path I must take!

24.「……レンダーシアの内海に面した灯台じゃ。| 昼も夜も 決して消えることのない|: A lighthouse facing the inland sea of|Lendersia. You can see the blue light that|burns day and night, never going out.

25.「その蒼き灯火が 真紅に染まっていく……。| レンダーシアのどこかには 間違いな: The blue light is turning crimson somewhere in|Lendersia, that's for sure. I can strongly|feel their presence there.

26.「……占いで見えたのは ここまで。| 蒼き炎を探し出し そこで幻炎の灰を使えば|: So much for the divination. Find the blue|flame and use the Flame Ashes there, and you|will find the way forward.

27.「敵の本拠地では 厳しい戦いになる。| 乗り込む前の準備は おこたらぬようにな。:
It will be a tough fight on the enemy's home|turf. Do not fail to make preparations before|you ride in. I'm counting on you,|
|!

28.「まあ……！| ケガ人に 無理をさせてはいけませんよ。| どうぞ お引き取りくだ: Well...! Don't force yourself on an injured|person. Please take your leave.

29.「わしは 館へ戻るとしよう。| 進むべき道に 迷った時は| また 訪ねてくるがい: I shall return to the museum. If you are lost|on the path you should take, come back and|visit me again.

30.「……もう一度だけ 聞こう。| ユーリは どこへ行った？| 答えろ フルーレ。: I'll ask you one more time. Where did Yuri go?|Answer me, Fulule.

31.「さて 知りませんね……。| たとえ 知っていたとしても| あなたに教えることは: Well, I don't know... and even if I did, I|have nothing to share with you.

32.「そうか……よかろう。| ならば 仕方ない。: Well... that's fine. Then we have no choice.

33.「お前たち夫婦の研究は すでに完成した。| すなわち……もはや 用済みというわけ: Your research has been completed. In other|words... you're no longer of any use to us.|Yuri will soon be following in your footsteps.

34.「……なるほど。我らが主の降臨を知ったユーリは| 外へ 助けを呼びに行ったという: I see. So, Yuri learned of our Lord's descent|and went outside to call for help. I'll deal|with you later.

36.「ようこそ 我らがアジトへ。| 私が 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドだ。: Welcome to our hideout. I am Buzzred, the|leader of the Redcoat Nightmare Gang.

37.「ほう……貴様のことは 知っているぞ。| 近頃 我々の活動を ことごとく邪魔して: Well...I know who you are. That damned fellow|who's been interfering with all our activities|lately. You've finally come on board.

38.「しかし それも すべて無駄なこと。| 数多の供物を捧げた今 ダークドレアム様の: But it is all in vain. Now that we have made|numerous offerings, the coming of Nokturnus is|just around the corner.

39.「時は来たれり！| 貴様を 最後の供物として捧げ| 我らが主を ここに降臨させて: The time has come! Let us offer you as our|final offering and let our Lord descend here!

41.「肉体を強化する この秘薬……| どこまでのチカラがあるか 私の身体で| 試すと: This elixir that strengthens the body... let's|see how powerful it is in my body!

42.「こっ これは……！？| すさまじいチカラが 身体中に みなぎる！| すごい す: What is this? I've got so much power in my|body! This is great, this is great, this is|great!　Hahahahaha...!

43.「ハハ ハ……ハハッ……？| グハッ グアアッ| アアアァァ……！！: Ha ha ha ha ha ha...? Guhahaha guhahahaaaa...!

44.「オオ オオオォッ……！| コレガ チカラ……サイキョウノ チカラ！| グオオオ: Ooh-ohh! This is the power of... the power of|the saikyo! ohohohohoh...!

48.「ふたりで 決めたこととはいえ……| 君をひとり アジトに残して行ったこと| 本: I'm really sorry that I left you alone at the|hideout, even though we had made a decision|together.

49.「……私たち キズだらけね。| でも それも当然の報いだわ。| こんな化け物を: We're covered in scratches. But we deserve it.|We created such a monster.

50.「ああ。でも これで終わるんだ。| 僕らの悪夢は ようやく終わったんだ……。: Oh. But it's over now. Our nightmare is|finally over.

52.「我らの見続けた 大いなる夢……。| 我が主の降臨……果たさねばならぬ！| なん: The great dream we have been dreaming of for|so long the coming of my Lord must be|fulfilled! At all costs!　At all costs!

53.「我が主よ！ 悪夢の暴帝ダークドレアムよ！| 私は 自らを供物として捧げよう。|: My Lord!　Nokturnus, the rampage of nightmares!|I offer myself as an offering. My body and|soul are yours!

54.「おお 我が主よ……。| こ…これでも……我が命をもってしても| まだ 降臨され: Oh, my Lord... even with all this... even with|my life, you still have not descended?

55.「我らの夢は かなわぬのか……！| グオォォ……オオオォォッ……！！: Can't our dream come true? ohohohoh...!

56.「首領のバズレッドを失い| これで紅衣の悪夢団は 壊滅するでしょう。| ダークド:
With the loss of their leader, Buzzred, the|Redcoat Nightmare Squad will now be destroyed.|The resurrection of Nokturnus seems to have|
|been prevented.

57.「……紅衣の悪夢団に連れ去られ| 強制されて 研究していたとはいえ| 私たちは: ...taken and forced by the Redcoat Nightmare|Gang, we have made a terrible mistake, even|though we were studying them.

58.「直接 手を汚していなくとも 私たちの研究は| 長年の間 多くの人々の命を危険に: Even without directly getting our hands dirty,|our research has endangered and sacrificed|many lives over the years.

59.「……悪夢団の手から どうか逃げ延びてほしいと| かすかな希望を託して 船に乗せ:
Our young child, whom we let escape on the|boat with a glimmer of hope that he might|escape from the hands of the Nightmare Gang,|
|was one of their victims.

60.「この罪は……こんな深い罪は……| 決して 消えることはないでしょう……！: This sin... this deep sin... will never go|away...!

61.「しかし そんな罪深い私たちを| あなたは キズだらけになりながら| 必死になっ: But you saved us, sinful as we were, with all|our wounds and desperately trying to help us.

62.「あなたに救われた この命に| もしも 意味があるとするならば……| 今度こそ: If this life that you saved has any meaning at|all, then this time I want to do research that|will be useful to persons.

63.「それが……研究者の私たちにできる| 唯一の 罪滅ぼしだと思うのです。: I think that is the only atonement we as|researchers can make.

With all our mistakes, with all our sins, we|promise to seek out what we should do, what we|can do, and what we can accomplish for the|
|good of this world.

65.「償いきれるはずも ありませんが……| あなたが生かしてくれた 私たちの命にかけ: There's no way I can atone for what I've done,|but I will make good on the promise I made to|you with our lives that you let us live...!

66.「紅衣の悪夢団の暴走を 止めてくださり| 本当に ありがとうございました。私たち: Thank you so much for stopping the Red Robe|Nightmare Squad from running amok. We will|embark on a new journey. Please take care...

67.「よう ひさしぶりだな！| あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。| どうしても会い: Hey, long time no see! There's something I|wanted to tell you. I really wanted to see|you.

68.「なあ 覚えてるか？| 志半ばで死んじまった オレの気持ち。| あんたに託した: Hey, you remember me? Remember how I felt when|I died? I left you my heart...

69.「かつて オレは レンダーシアのとある村で| 家族と共に 平和に暮らしていた。|:
Once upon a time, I lived a peaceful life with|my family in a village in Lendersia. ...until|a mysterious group of men in red cloaks|
|arrived.

71.「そう！ 忘れもしない あの赤マント！| 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドこそ|: Yes!　I'll never forget that red cape! Buzzred,|the leader of the Redcoat Nightmare Clan, was|the one I swore to avenge.

72.「オヤジは ダークドレアムへの供物として狙われ| 村もろとも 消されちまったって: My father was targeted as an offering to|Nokturnus and the whole village was wiped|out....

73.「できるなら この手で 仇を討ちたかったが……| 俺のチカラじゃ かなわなかった:
If I could, I would have avenged him with my|own hands, but I'm not sure I would have had|the strength to do it. I'm really glad you|
|avenged me.

74.「ああ……今なら オレの人生にも| 意味があったんだと思える。| あんたと出会え: Yeah... now I can see that my life had|meaning. I was saved by meeting you.

75.「冥王を倒すだけでなく とうとう| オレの親の仇まで とってくれやがって……。|: Not only did he defeat the Dark Lord, but he|finally avenged my parents... He really is a|great guy!

76.「あんたは これからも オレの身体で| 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろう。: You will continue to fight the bad guys with|my body. I'm really proud of you for that.

77.「いろいろと 世話になっちまったな。| 礼と言ってはなんだが これをもらってくれ: I've taken care of a lot of things for you. I|don't mean to thank you, but please take this.|I'm sure it will come in handy someday.

79.「さてと……そろそろ お別れだな。| もう 心残りは何もない！| すがすがしい気: Well... it's time to say goodbye. I have no|more regrets! My heart is filled with a|refreshing feeling.

80.「ありがとな エテーネの村の <pc>。| あんたは オレの希望であり……| こ: Thank you, <pc> of Ethene Village.|You are my hope and the hope of Astoltia|itself!

81.「やあ ひさしぶりだね！| あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。| どうしても会い: Hey, long time no see! I wanted to tell you|something. I really wanted to meet you.

82.「ねえ 覚えてるかい？| 志半ばで死んじまった アタシの気持ち。| あんたに託し: Hey, do you remember me? Remember how I felt|when I died in the middle of my life? I left|you my heart...

94.「ありがとう エテーネの村の <pc>。| あんたは アタシの希望であり……|: Thank you, <pc> of Ethene Village.|You are my hope... the very hope of this|Astoltia!

95.「やあ どうも。ひさしぶり！| 君に 伝えたいことがあって| どうしても会いたく: Hey there. Long time no see! There's something|I really wanted to tell you, so I came here to|see you.

96.「君は 覚えてるかな？| 孤児院で育った僕が 本当の両親を探して| 旅に出ようと: Do you remember? I grew up in an orphanage,|and just as I was about to embark on a journey|to find my real parents, they died...

97.「僕の両親は きっと とんでもないトラブルに| 巻き込まれ 僕を手放したんだ。だ: My parents must have gotten into some serious|trouble and gave me away. That's why I asked|you to help me find them.

98.「顔も声も 覚えていなかったけれど| あの人たちが 泣いた時……わかったんだ。|: I didn't remember their faces or their voices,|but when those persons cried I knew. Yuri and|Fulule were definitely my parents.

99.「僕を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して| 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。|: You had no choice but to go to the sea with a|glimmer of hope to let me go... or so I|thought. Thank you, father and mother.

. Thank you for finding my|parents and saving them from the Nightmare|Gang, just like I wished. I really can't thank|
|you enough.

104.「その夢……陰ながら 応援させてもらうよ。| 今までの 感謝の気持ちを込めて|: I will support your dream from the shadows. I|hope you will accept this small token of my|appreciation for all you have done for me.

106.「さあ そろそろ お別れの時間だ。| さようなら……もうひとりの <pc>。|: Well, it's time to say goodbye. Goodbye...the|other <pc>. I'm really glad I met|you.

107.「これからも 大切な両親と……| 君という希望が息づく アストルティアの大地を|: I will always watch over you, my precious|parents, and the land of Astoltia, where the|hope that is you lives and breathes!

108.「やっほー！ ひっさしぶり～！| 私ね あなたに 伝えたいことがあって| どうし: Hey there!　Long time no see~! I wanted to tell|you something and I really wanted to meet|you... so I came here.

109.「あなたは 覚えてくれてたかな？| 孤児院で育った私が パパとママを探して| 旅: I wonder if you remember... That I grew up in|an orphanage and died just as I was about to|embark on a journey to find my mom and dad.

110.「パパとママは きっと とんでもないトラブルに| 巻き込まれて 私を手放したはず: My mom and dad must have gotten into some|serious trouble and gave me away. That's why I|asked you to find them and save them.

112.「私を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して| 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。|: You had no choice but to go to the sea with a|glimmer of hope to let me go... or so I|thought. Dad, Mom... thank you.

113.「確かに パパとママは 悪夢団に協力したりして| すっごく悪いこと しちゃったか: It's true that Mom and Dad may have done some|very bad things, such as cooperating with the|Nightmare Gang.

114.「でも 誰が責めたって 私だけはふたりの味方！| 今度こそ 人の役に立つ研究をす:

|this time!

115.「<pc>。私のお願いを聞いてくれて……| パパとママを救ってくれて ありがとう: <pc>. Thank you for doing me a favor|and saving my mom and dad. I really can't|thank you enough.

116.「でも あなたは 私のパパとママだけじゃなくて| 世界まるごと 救っちゃうつもり: But you're going to save not only my mom and|dad, but the whole world, aren't you?

117.「その夢……全力で 応援しちゃう！| 今までの お礼の気持ちも込めて| これは: I'll do my best to support your dream! This is|my gift to you as a token of my appreciation|for all you've done. Please take it!

119.「さーてと。そろそろ お別れの時間っぽい。| じゃあね……もうひとりの <pc>: Well... I guess it's time to say goodbye. Bye|bye...the other <pc>. I was happy to|have met you.
